description: More than 70 staff resign at top independent site Index, in a row over media freedom.
title: Hungary's Index journalists walk out over sacking
title_page: Hungary's Index journalists walk out over sacking - BBC News
maintext: Only last month, Szabolcs Dull had warned that Index was "under such external pressure that could spell out the end of our editorial staff as we know it". In an alarming piece published on 22 June, he warned that the website's editorial staff were "in danger" and the dial on a "freedom barometer" on the homepage was moved to "in danger".
